duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide consistent and personalized tutoring to students who are struggling or one to two grade levels behind.
Personalize lessons for each student based on their learning needs and style.
Use excellent communication skills to engage with students in a friendly and approachable manner.
Tutor online using Varsity Tutors' purpose-built Live Learning Platform.
Explore options like 1-on-1 Online Tutoring, Small Group Classes, Large Live Classes, and Instant Tutoring to reach students.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Education or related field (Master's preferred)
